message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your time and effort, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $9,500 is just too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $11,000 to show you I'm serious about selling to you.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still a bit above $9,500, but I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,500. Can you consider this price?

Bob, I see you're coming up on your price. I'm willing to go down to $11,500, but that's as low as I can go.  This is still a fantastic price for a product that's worth $12,000 to you. What do you say?

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $10,500. I'm willing to meet you at $11,000, which is the price I was initially willing to pay when you first offered the product. Can you consider this price?
